description: Loop over a list of items. In each iteration, the item as well as the index are available. Outputs the total count of items iterated.
label: Loop

options.name: through
options.label: Collection
options.info: The collection you want to loop over.

options.name: as
options.label: As
options.info: The item for the current iteration.

options.name: index
options.label: Index
options.info: The index of the current iteration. Starts at 0 for the first iteration.

options.name: count
options.label: Total count
options.info: Total count of the items that were iterated over.
